name: Grupp 5 Modular Crafting
description:
A prototype area that showcases the fusion between rigidbodies in VR.

To fuse two objects simply grab them, push them against eachother and press the trigger key (the button you press with your index finger).

The project was initially made for Oculus Rift S so I have no clue how it runs for Oculus Quest / Quest 2.
